alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 1:05PM MST until December 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches from 6500 to 7500 feet. Higher amounts of 4 to 8 inches above 7500 feet. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet near Alpine, Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard, Pinetop-Lakeside, Show Low, Whiteriver and Williams. * WHEN...From 5 PM MST Thursday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Hazardous travel conditions will impact morning and evening commutes, including along and near the I-17 and I-40 corridor. Snow forecast from 5 PM Today to 5 AM Saturday: Alpine 1 to 3 inches Williams 1 to 2 inches Flagstaff 1 to 3 inches Forest Lakes 4 to 8 inches Pinetop-Lkside 2 to 4 inches Show Low 1 to 3 inches
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains
